ingredients.text: 2 cups chocolate or peanut butter chips

directions.text: Sift together flour, salt, and baking soda in a mixing bowl.
Stir the egg, milk and vanilla in another bowl.
Mix the butter in a mixer starting on low speed for a couple minutes.
Add both sugars slowly and increase the speed to medium until butter is fluffy.
Reduce speed to low and add the egg mixture slowly, increase speed to medium until combined
Slowly add the chocolate or peanut butter chips.
Scoop cookies onto parchment, 6 cookies per sheet and bake on a backing sheet for 10 mins a sheet.
Once cooked immediately place on a drying rack and eventually store in an air tight container
